hero_headline: Your secret weapon for effective cold emails
hero_subtitle: OutreachGenie uses AI to help you write personalized, persuasive and concise messages that convert.
benefits_subtitle: AI writes messages for you, saves time and increases your chance of getting replies.
benefit_1_desc: Personalizes messages based on name, company and purpose.
benefit_2_desc: Write 20+ messages in under 15 minutes ‚Äì perfect for outreach campaigns.
benefit_3_desc: Generate attention-grabbing messages and get more replies.
demo_title: How does one generated message look?
demo_full_text:
Hi Maja,

I saw your profile and your Reels about confidence really caught my eye.
I edit TikTok and Reels for creators who have a good story but want it in a format that holds attention better.

If you want ‚Äì I can edit one clip for free so you can see if you like my style.

Cheers!
Luka üé¨

testi_3_quote: Finally a tool that writes for me. I focus on creativity, AI handles communication.
